text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow While Covid-19 runs rampant, Russia pays bounty on our soldiers, 46 million Americans are out of work, and Trump begs foreign leaders to help him steal the next election, you think that the problem that needs to be addressed is .... @AOC?!?
